mapper.select: SELECT t.id, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') requestDate, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(s.sex,'XB') sex, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.student_id,'T_XG_STUDENT','STUDENT_ID','NAME') studentId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.class_id,'T_XG_CLASS','CLASS_ID','CLASS_NAME') classId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.major_code,'t_xg_major','major_code','major_name') majorCode, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.department_id,'T_SYS_DEPT','DEPT_ID','DEPT_NAME') departmentId, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.grant_management_term,'XQ') grantManagementTerm, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.GRANT_MANAGEMENT_NAME,'JZXJMC') grantManagementName, s.NAME studentId, s.idcard idcard, d.CLASS_NAME classId, m.major_code majorCode, e.DEPT_ID departmentId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(d.HEAD_TEACHER) headTeacher, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.major_code,'t_xg_major','major_code','major_name') majorCode, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag FROM T_XG_GRANT_MANAGEMENT_WF t left join T_XG_STUDENT s on t.student_id=s.student_id left join T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS c on s.student_id=c.student_id left join T_XG_CLASS d on d.class_id = c.class_id left join T_XG_MAJOR m on m.major_code = d.major_code left join T_SYS_DEPT e on e.dept_id = m.departments_id WHERE t.id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc

SELECT t.id, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(t.request_date,'hh24:mi') requestDate, t.class_id classId, t.major_code majorCode, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag, t.department_id departmentId, t.student_id studentId, t.GRANT_MANAGEMENT_NAME grantManagementName, t.GRANT_MANAGEMENT_TERM grantManagementTerm, t.sex sex FROM T_XG_GRANT_MANAGEMENT_WF t WHERE id = #{id}
ORDER BY t.create_time desc
mapper.update: update T_XG_GRANT_MANAGEMENT_WF SET GRANT_MANAGEMENT_NAME = #{grantManagementName}, GRANT_MANAGEMENT_TERM = #{grantManagementTerm}, request_date = to_date(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.class_id as "value", t.class_name as "label" FROM T_XG_CLASS t
select t.name as "label", t.student_id as "value" FROM T_XG_STUDENT t
SELECT name from t_rs_employee WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT dept_name from t_sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId}

SELECT s.name, s.student_id, s.idcard, s.sex, s.year, d.CLASS_ID, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(c.departments_id,'T_SYS_DEPT','DEPT_ID','DEPT_ID') departmentsId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(d.CLASS_ID,'T_XG_CLASS','CLASS_ID','MAJOR_CODE') majorCode FROM T_XG_STUDENT s left join T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS d on s.STUDENT_ID = d.STUDENT_ID left join t_xg_class c on d.class_id = c.class_id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}
